children.name: analytics
children.toolTip: The flare.analytics package provides classes for analytics.

children.name: cluster
children.toolTip: The flare.analytics.cluster package provides classes for clustering data into groups.

children.name: AgglomerativeCluster
children.toolTip: Hierarchically clusters a set of items using agglomerative clustering.

children.name: CommunityStructure
children.toolTip: Hierarchically clusters a network based on inferred community structure.

children.name: HierarchicalCluster
children.toolTip: Base class for clustering operators that construct a hierarchical clustering tree.

children.name: graph
children.toolTip: The flare.analytics.graph package provides classes for analyzing network structures.

children.name: BetweennessCentrality
children.toolTip: Calculates betweenness centrality measures for nodes in a graph.

children.name: LinkDistance
children.toolTip: Calculates the link distance from a source node based on a breadth-first traversal.

children.name: MaxFlowMinCut
children.toolTip: Calculates the maximum flow along edges of a graph using the Edmonds-Karp method.

children.name: ShortestPaths
children.toolTip: Calculates the shortest paths to a source node using Dijkstra's algorithm.

children.name: SpanningTree
children.toolTip: Calculates a spanning tree for a graph structure.

children.name: optimization
children.toolTip: The flare.analytics.optimization package provides classes for optimizing the presentation of visualizations.

children.name: AspectRatioBanker
children.toolTip: Computes an optimized aspect ratio for drawing a line chart.

children.name: animate
children.toolTip: The flare.animate package provides classes for creating animated transitions.

children.name: Easing
children.toolTip: Collection of easing functions to control animation rates.

children.name: FunctionSequence
children.toolTip: Transition that runs sub-transitions in sequential order while also invoking a function before each sub-transition is run.

children.name: interpolate
children.toolTip: The flare.animate.interpolate package provides classes for interpolating object property values.

children.name: ArrayInterpolator
children.toolTip: Interpolator for numeric Array values.

children.name: ColorInterpolator
children.toolTip: Interpolator for color (uint) values.

children.name: DateInterpolator
children.toolTip: Interpolator for Date values.

children.name: Interpolator
children.toolTip: Base class for value interpolators.

children.name: MatrixInterpolator
children.toolTip: Interpolator for flash.geom.Matrix values.

children.name: NumberInterpolator
children.toolTip: Interpolator for Number and int values.

children.name: ObjectInterpolator
children.toolTip: Interpolator for arbitrary Object values.

children.name: PointInterpolator
children.toolTip: Interpolator for flash.geom.Point values.

children.name: RectangleInterpolator
children.toolTip: Interpolator for flash.geom.Rectangle values.

children.name: ISchedulable
children.toolTip: Interface for schedulable objects that can be run by the Scheduler class.

children.name: Parallel
children.toolTip: Transition that runs multiple transitions simultaneously (in parallel).

children.name: Pause
children.toolTip: Transition representing a pause or dwell in which nothing happens.

children.name: Scheduler
children.toolTip: Scheduler that oversees animation and time-based processing.

children.name: Sequence
children.toolTip: Transition that runs multiple transitions one after the other in sequence.

children.name: Transition
children.toolTip: Base class representing an animated transition.

children.name: Transitioner
children.toolTip: Parallel transition with convenience methods for adding new object tweens, helping to incrementally construct a group of transitions.

children.name: TransitionEvent
children.toolTip: Event fired when a Transition starts, steps, ends, or is canceled.

children.name: Tween
children.toolTip: Transition that interpolates (in-betweens) properties of a target object over a time interval.

children.name: data
children.toolTip: The flare.data package provides classes for describing and importing external data sets.

children.name: converters
children.toolTip: The flare.data.converters package provides classes for converting data between external formats and ActionScript objects.

children.name: Converters
children.toolTip: Factory class for looking up the appropriate IDataConverter for a given data format.

children.name: DelimitedTextConverter
children.toolTip: Converts data between delimited text (e.g., tab delimited) and flare DataSet instances.

children.name: GraphMLConverter
children.toolTip: Converts data between GraphML markup and flare DataSet instances.

children.name: IDataConverter
children.toolTip: Interface for data converters that map between an external data file format and ActionScript objects (e.g., Arrays and Objects).

children.name: JSONConverter
children.toolTip: Converts data between JSON (JavaScript Object Notation) strings and flare DataSet instances.

children.name: DataField
children.toolTip: A data field stores metadata for an individual data variable.

children.name: DataSchema
children.toolTip: A data schema represents a set of data variables and their associated types.

children.name: DataSet
children.toolTip: A data set is a collection of data tables.

children.name: DataSource
children.toolTip: A data source provides access to remote data on the Internet.

children.name: DataTable
children.toolTip: A data table maintains a collection of data objects, each representing a row of data, and an optional data schema describing the data variables.

children.name: DataUtil
children.toolTip: Utility class for parsing and representing data field values.

children.name: display
children.toolTip: The flare.display package provides classes for display objects that automatically redraw themselves as needed.

children.name: DirtySprite
children.toolTip: A Sprite that redraws itself as needed when marked as dirty.

children.name: LineSprite
children.toolTip: A Sprite representing a line.

children.name: RectSprite
children.toolTip: A Sprite representing a rectangle shape.

children.name: TextSprite
children.toolTip: A Sprite representing a text label.

children.name: flex
children.toolTip: The flare.flex package provides classes for integrating Flare visualizations into Flex applications.

children.name: FlareVis
children.toolTip: Flex component that wraps a Flare visualization instance.

children.name: physics
children.toolTip: The flare.physics package provides classes for physical simulations involving particles, springs, and forces.

children.name: DragForce
children.toolTip: Force simulating frictional drag forces (e.g., air resistance).

children.name: GravityForce
children.toolTip: Force simulating a global gravitational pull on Particle instances.

children.name: IForce
children.toolTip: Interface representing a force within a physics simulation.

children.name: NBodyForce
children.toolTip: Force simulating an N-Body force of charged particles with pairwise interaction, such as gravity or electrical charge.

children.name: Particle
children.toolTip: Represents a Particle in a physics simulation.

children.name: Simulation
children.toolTip: A physical simulation involving particles, springs, and forces.

children.name: Spring
children.toolTip: Represents a Spring in a physics simulation.

children.name: SpringForce
children.toolTip: Force simulating a spring force between two particles.

children.name: query
children.toolTip: The flare.query package provides classes for creating and processing SQL-style queries over ActionScript objects.

children.name: AggregateExpression
children.toolTip: Base class representing an aggregate query operator.

children.name: And
children.toolTip: Expression operator that computes the logical and of sub-expression clauses.

children.name: Arithmetic
children.toolTip: Expression operator for arithmetic operations.

children.name: Average
children.toolTip: Aggregate operator for computing the average of a set of values.

children.name: BinaryExpression
children.toolTip: Base class for binary expression operators.

children.name: Comparison
children.toolTip: Expression operator for comparing sub-expression values.

children.name: CompositeExpression
children.toolTip: Base class for expressions with an arbitrary number of sub-expressions.

children.name: Count
children.toolTip: Aggregate operator for counting the number of items in a set of values.

children.name: DateUtil
children.toolTip: Utility class providing functions for manipulating Date objects.

children.name: Distinct
children.toolTip: Aggregate (group-by) operator for counting the number of distinct values in a set of values.

children.name: Expression
children.toolTip: Base class for query expression operators.

children.name: ExpressionIterator
children.toolTip: The ExpressionIterator simplifies the process of traversing an expression tree.

children.name: Fn
children.toolTip: Expression operator that performs function invocation.

children.name: If
children.toolTip: Expression operator for an if statement that performs conditional execution.

children.name: IsA
children.toolTip: Expression operator that type checks a sub-expression.

children.name: Literal
children.toolTip: Expression operator for a literal value.

children.name: Match
children.toolTip: Expression operator for text matching operations.

children.name: Maximum
children.toolTip: Aggregate operator for computing the maximum of a set of values.

children.name: methods
children.toolTip: The flare.query.methods package provides convenience methods for writing queries and expressions.

children.name: add
children.toolTip: Creates a new addition Arithmetic query operator.

children.name: and
children.toolTip: Creates a new And query operator.

children.name: average
children.toolTip: Creates a new Average query operator.

children.name: count
children.toolTip: Creates a new Count query operator.

children.name: distinct
children.toolTip: Creates a new Distinct query operator.

children.name: div
children.toolTip: Creates a new division Arithmetic query operator.

children.name: eq
children.toolTip: Creates a new equality Comparison query operator.

children.name: fn
children.toolTip: Creates a new Fn query operator for a function in a query.

children.name: gt
children.toolTip: Creates a new greater-than Comparison query operator.

children.name: gte
children.toolTip: Creates a new greater-than-or-equal Comparison query operator.

children.name: iff
children.toolTip: Creates a new If query operator.

children.name: isa
children.toolTip: Creates a new IsType query operator.

children.name: lt
children.toolTip: Creates a new less-than Comparison query operator.

children.name: lte
children.toolTip: Creates a new less-than-or-equal Comparison query operator.

children.name: max
children.toolTip: Creates a new Maximum query operator.

children.name: min
children.toolTip: Creates a new Minimum query operator.

children.name: mod
children.toolTip: Creates a new modulo Arithmetic query operator.

children.name: mul
children.toolTip: Creates a new multiplication Arithmetic query operator.

children.name: neq
children.toolTip: Creates a new inequality Comparison query operator.

children.name: not
children.toolTip: Creates a new Not query operator.

children.name: or
children.toolTip: Creates a new Or query operator.

children.name: orderby
children.toolTip: Create a new Query with the given sort criteria.

children.name: range
children.toolTip: Creates a new Range query operator.

children.name: select
children.toolTip: Create a new Query with the given select clauses.

children.name: stddev
children.toolTip: Creates a new Variance query operator that computes the population standard deviation.

children.name: sub
children.toolTip: Creates a new subtraction Arithmetic query operator.

children.name: sum
children.toolTip: Creates a new sum Arithmetic query operator.

children.name: update
children.toolTip: Create a new Query with the given update clauses.

children.name: variance
children.toolTip: Creates a new Variance query operator that computes the population variance.

children.name: where
children.toolTip: Create a new Query with the given filter expression.

children.name: xor
children.toolTip: Creates a new Xor (exclusive or) query operator.
Returns a new Literal operator.

children.name: Minimum
children.toolTip: Aggregate operator for computing the minimum of a set of values.

children.name: Not
children.toolTip: Expression operator that returns the logical not of a sub-expression.

children.name: Or
children.toolTip: Expression operator that computes the logical or of sub-expression clauses.

children.name: Query
children.toolTip: Performs query processing over a collection of ActionScript objects.

children.name: Range
children.toolTip: Expression operator that tests if a value is within a given range.

children.name: StringUtil
children.toolTip: Utility class providing functions for manipulating String objects.

children.name: Sum
children.toolTip: Aggregate operator for computing the sum of a set of values.

children.name: Variable
children.toolTip: Expression operator that retrieves a value from an object property.

children.name: Variance
children.toolTip: Aggregate operator for computing variance or standard deviation.

children.name: Xor
children.toolTip: Expression operator that computes the exclusive-or (xor) of sub-expression clauses.

children.name: scale
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.scale package provides classes for data scales such as linear, logarithmic, and ordinal scales.

children.name: IScaleMap
children.toolTip: Interface used by classes which support mapping between spatial (x,y) coordinates and values in a data scale.

children.name: LinearScale
children.toolTip: Scale that spaces values linearly along the scale range.

children.name: LogScale
children.toolTip: Scale that performs a log transformation of the data.

children.name: OrdinalScale
children.toolTip: Scale for ordered sequential data.

children.name: QuantileScale
children.toolTip: Scale that organizes data into discrete bins by quantiles.

children.name: QuantitativeScale
children.toolTip: Base class for representing quantitative numerical data scales.

children.name: RootScale
children.toolTip: Scale that performs a root transformation of the data.

children.name: Scale
children.toolTip: Base class for all data scale types.

children.name: ScaleType
children.toolTip: Constants defining known scale types, such as linear, log, and date/time scales.

children.name: TimeScale
children.toolTip: Scale for timelines represented using Date values.

children.name: util
children.toolTip: The flare.util package provides classes for manipulating common data types and accessing object properties in a generalized fashion.

children.name: Arrays
children.toolTip: Utility methods for working with arrays.

children.name: Colors
children.toolTip: Utility methods for working with colors.

children.name: Dates
children.toolTip: Utility methods for working with Date instances.

children.name: Displays
children.toolTip: Utility methods for working with display objects.

children.name: Filter
children.toolTip: Utility methods for creating filter functions.

children.name: Geometry
children.toolTip: Utility methods for computational geometry.

children.name: heap
children.toolTip: The flare.util.heap package provides a heap data structure for a priority queue.

children.name: FibonacciHeap
children.toolTip: A Fibonacci heap data structure for maintaining a sorted priority queue.

children.name: HeapNode
children.toolTip: A node in a heap data structure.

children.name: IEvaluable
children.toolTip: Interface for methods that evaluate an object and return a result.

children.name: IPredicate
children.toolTip: Interface for methods that evaluate an object and return true or false.

children.name: IValueProxy
children.toolTip: Interface for classes that get and set named property values of objects.

children.name: math
children.toolTip: The flare.util.math package provides data structures and classes for specialized mathematics.

children.name: DenseMatrix
children.toolTip: A matrix of numbers implemented using an array of values.

children.name: IMatrix
children.toolTip: Interface for a matrix of real-valued numbers.

children.name: SparseMatrix
children.toolTip: A matrix of numbers implemented using a hashtable of values.

children.name: Maths
children.toolTip: Utility methods for mathematics not found in the Math class.

children.name: Orientation
children.toolTip: Constants defining layout orientations.

children.name: palette
children.toolTip: The flare.util.palette package provides classes for color, shape, and size palettes for visual encoding.

children.name: ColorPalette
children.toolTip: Palette for color values, including utility methods for generating both categorical and ordinal color palettes.

children.name: Palette
children.toolTip: Base class for palettes, such as color and size palettes, that map from interpolated scale values into visual properties

children.name: ShapePalette
children.toolTip: Palette for shape values that maps integer indices to shape drawing functions.

children.name: sizePalette
children.toolTip: Palette for size values represeneted as scale factors.

children.name: Property
children.toolTip: Utility class for accessing arbitrary property chains, allowing nested property expressions (e.g., x.a.b.c or x.a[1]).

children.name: Shapes
children.toolTip: Utility class defining shape types and shape drawing routines.

children.name: Sort
children.toolTip: Utility class for sorting and creating sorting functions.

children.name: Stats
children.toolTip: Utility class for computing statistics for a collection of values.

children.name: Strings
children.toolTip: Utility methods for working with String instances.

children.name: vis
children.toolTip: The flare.vis package provides classes for creating interactive data visualizations.

children.name: axis
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.axis package provides classes for presenting and animating axes in a data visualization.

children.name: Axes
children.toolTip: Base class for representing metric data axes.

children.name: Axis
children.toolTip: A metric data axis consisting of axis labels and gridlines.

children.name: AxisGridLine
children.toolTip: Axis grid line in an axis display.

children.name: AxisLabel
children.toolTip: Axis label in an axis display.

children.name: CartesianAxes
children.toolTip: Axes class representing 2D Cartesian (X-Y) axes.

children.name: controls
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.controls package provides classes for interacting with data visualizations.

children.name: AnchorControl
children.toolTip: Interactive control for updating a layout's anchor point in response to mouse movement.

children.name: ClickControl
children.toolTip: Interactive control for responding to mouse clicks events.

children.name: Control
children.toolTip: Base class for interactive controls.

children.name: ControlList
children.toolTip: A ControlList maintains a sequential chain of controls for interacting with a visualization.

children.name: DragControl
children.toolTip: Interactive control for dragging items.

children.name: ExpandControl
children.toolTip: Interactive control for expaning and collapsing graph or tree nodes by clicking them.

children.name: HoverControl
children.toolTip: Interactive control for responding to mouse hover events.

children.name: IControl
children.toolTip: Attach this control to the given interactive object. This method will automatically detach if already attached to another object.

children.name: PanZoomControl
children.toolTip: Interactive control for panning and zooming a camera.

children.name: SelectionControl
children.toolTip: Interactive control for selecting a group of objects by rubber-banding them with a rectangular section region.

children.name: TooltipControl
children.toolTip: Interactive control for displaying a tooltip in response to mouse hovers exceeding a minimum time interval.

children.name: data
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.data package provides classes for visually representing data elements as DataSprite instances.

children.name: Data
children.toolTip: Data structure for managing a collection of visual data objects.

children.name: DataList
children.toolTip: Data structure for a collection of DataSprite instances.

children.name: DataSprite
children.toolTip: Base class for display objects that represent visualized data.

children.name: EdgeSprite
children.toolTip: Visually represents a connection between two data elements.

children.name: NodeSprite
children.toolTip: Visually represents a data element, such as a data tuple or graph node.

children.name: render
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.data.render package provides classes for customized rendering of DataSprite instances.

children.name: ArrowType
children.toolTip: Utility class defining arrow types for directed edges.

children.name: EdgeRenderer
children.toolTip: Renderer that draws edges as lines.

children.name: IRenderer
children.toolTip: Interface for DataSprite rendering modules.

children.name: ShapeRenderer
children.toolTip: Renderer that draws shapes.

children.name: ScaleBinding
children.toolTip: Utility class that binds a data property to a descriptive scale.

children.name: Tree
children.toolTip: Data structure for managing a collection of visual data objects in a tree (hierarchy) structure.

children.name: TreeBuilder
children.toolTip: Calculates a spanning tree for a graph structure.

children.name: events
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.events package provides classes for events issued in the flare.vis visualization framework.

children.name: DataEvent
children.toolTip: Event fired when a data collection is modified.

children.name: SelectionEvent
children.toolTip: Event fired in response to interactive selection events.

children.name: TooltipEvent
children.toolTip: Event fired in response to tooltip show, hide, or update events.

children.name: VisualizationEvent
children.toolTip: Event fired in response to visualization updates.

children.name: legend
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.legend package provides classes for presenting legends for data visualizations.

children.name: Legend
children.toolTip: A legend describing the visual encoding of a data property.

children.name: LegendItem
children.toolTip: An item in a discrete legend consisting of a label and an icon indicating color, shape, and/or size.

children.name: LegendRange
children.toolTip: A range in a continuous legend, consisting of a continuous visual scale and value labels.

children.name: operator
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.operator package provides classes for visualization operators for encoding and processing visualized data.

children.name: distortion
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.operator.distortion package provides classes for distorting the position and size of visualized data.

children.name: BifocalDistortion
children.toolTip: Computes a bifocal distortion of space, magnifying a focus region of space and uniformly demagnifying the rest of the space.

children.name: Distortion
children.toolTip: Base class for distortion operators that adjust the position and size of visual objects in a visualization.

children.name: FisheyeDistortion
children.toolTip: Computes a graphical fisheye distortion of a graph view.

children.name: encoder
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.operator.encoding package provides classes for visually encoding properties such as color, shape, and size.

children.name: ColorEncoder
children.toolTip: Encodes a data field into color values, using a scale transform and color palette.

children.name: Encoder
children.toolTip: Base class for Operators that perform encoding of visual variables such as color, shape, and size.

children.name: PropertyEncoder
children.toolTip: Encodes property values for a collection of visual items.

children.name: ShapeEncoder
children.toolTip: Encodes a data field into shape values, using an ordinal scale.

children.name: sizeEncoder
children.toolTip: Encodes a data field into size values, using a scale transform and a size palette to determines an item's scale.

children.name: filter
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.operator.filter package provides classes for visually filtering items by setting their visibility.

children.name: FisheyeTreeFilter
children.toolTip: Filter operator that computes a fisheye degree-of-interest function over a tree structure.

children.name: GraphDistanceFilter
children.toolTip: Filter operator that sets visible all items within a specified graph distance from a set of focus nodes.

children.name: VisibilityFilter
children.toolTip: Filter operator that sets item visibility based on a filtering condition.

children.name: IOperator
children.toolTip: Interface for operators that perform processing tasks on the contents of a Visualization.

children.name: label
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.operator.label package provides classes for creating and positioning labels.

children.name: Labeler
children.toolTip: Labeler that adds labels for items in a visualization.

children.name: RadialLabeler
children.toolTip: Labeler that positions labels around a circle in polar coordinates.

children.name: StackedAreaLabeler
children.toolTip: Labeler for a stacked area chart.

children.name: layout
children.toolTip: The flare.vis.operator.layout package provides classes for calculating the spatial position of visualized data.

children.name: AxisLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that places items along the X and Y axes according to data properties.

children.name: BundledEdgeRouter
children.toolTip: Layout that routes edges in a graph so that they form groups, reducing clutter.

children.name: CircleLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that places items in a circular layout.

children.name: CirclePackingLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that places nodes as circles compacted into a larger circle.

children.name: DendrogramLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that places items in a dendrogram for displaying the results of hierarchical clustering.

children.name: ForceDirectedLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that places nodes based on a physics simulation of interacting forces.

children.name: IcicleTreeLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that places nodes in an icicle layout, distributing nodes evenly within the display bounds.

children.name: IndentedTreeLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that places tree nodes in an indented outline layout.

children.name: Layout
children.toolTip: Base class for all operators that perform spatial layout.

children.name: NodeLinkTreeLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that places nodes using a tidy layout of a node-link tree diagram.

children.name: PieLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that places wedges for pie and donut charts.

children.name: RadialTreeLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that places tree nodes in a radial layout, laying out depths of a tree along circles of increasing radius.

children.name: RandomLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that places nodes randomly within the layout bounds.

children.name: StackedAreaLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that consecutively places items on top of each other.

children.name: TreeMapLayout
children.toolTip: Layout that places node in a TreeMap layout that optimizes for low aspect ratios of visualized tree nodes.

children.name: Operator
children.toolTip: Operators performs processing tasks on the contents of a Visualization.

children.name: OperatorList
children.toolTip: An OperatorList maintains a sequential chain of operators that are invoked one after the other.

children.name: OperatorSequence
children.toolTip: An OperatorSequence maintains a list of operators that are run in sequence with an animated transition in between each.

children.name: OperatorSwitch
children.toolTip: An OperatorSwitch maintains a list of operators but only runs one of these operators when invoked.

children.name: SortOperator
children.toolTip: A SortOperator sorts a data group.

children.name: Visualization
children.toolTip: The Visualization class represents an interactive data visualization.
